title: What large project did you start working on that ended up going nowhere? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of my large projects that ended up going nowhere were software projects. They could have succeeded if I worked harder and got help or funding from others, but I chose to do it myself. Sometimes, in software, the game-industry and gaming-public can change overnight. So a project can go nowhere, just because the market moved it's interest elsewhere before the project is completed.

In 2000 I thought to become a free time inventor of a new cloth peg to dry wet washed clothes on a drying line inside or outside the house : without the metal spring inside the peg and if you push each of the both ends of the peg I should open the opposite way . It is not yet a clothes peg but … together with friends and colleagues we found a purpose to a little peg called WimClip which you can use to connect wishing cards or pictures on a wall. You see : if some doors close another opens. KeepDreamingandworkingGreetings.
